Body: Hello Android Enthusiasts,I was wondering if KingRoot can potentially brick my HTC One and Nexus 9. I have not rooted either yet for my warranty is still active. If either is bricked, is there a way that it could possibly be recovered? If possible, could you please provide me with some statistics or percentages regarding the likeliness of one of these devices becoming bricked? Here are a few more specifications about my devices:HTC One M8 Harman Kardon Edition from SprintHTC Google Nexus 9 (No carrier, WiFi)Thank you in advance.Regards,Ani
Title: Can KingRoot Brick my Nexus 9 and HTC One
